events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer role submitted by the candidate on the company portal.
The application has been categorised under Engineering based on the candidate's experience as a software developer.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage the candidate's progress through the hiring pipeline.
Initial phone screening was completed successfully, and the candidate showed strong understanding of software engineering principles.
Candidate responded promptly and confirmed availability for the upcoming technical interview as proposed.
Technical interview has been scheduled for April 15th at 14:00 UTC to assess coding skills and system design expertise.
